trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_SEQ_00<tab>Wolkan of the Gladiators' Guild is muttering frantically to himself about an infestation of ladybugs in the region.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_SEQ_01<tab>Travel to western Thanalan and slay four of the pestilent ladybugs.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_SEQ_02<tab>You have bravely slain four unsuspecting ladybugs. Return to the Gladiators' Guild and tell Wolkan of your heroic deed.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_SEQ_03<tab>By felling several nefarious ladybugs, you have made the road through Thanalan a deal safer for traveling merchants.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_TODO_01<tab>Report to Wolkan at the Gladiators' Guild.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_000<tab>Carried yer arse in here lookin' for work, eh? Well, yer in luck. Just so happens I've a deed what needs doin'.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_001<tab>Wild ladybugs've been wreakin' bloody havoc on the outskirts of town. Somethin' in the air of late's made 'em ornery as an aurochs in rut.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_002<tab>Ain't much for fightin' on their own, but in numbers they're more than a match for any merchant who's seen more days at the teat than he has on the battlefield.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_003<tab>Well, what'll it be? Fancy puttin' down four or so of the bloody buggers, or don't ye?
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_010<tab>Back in one piece, are ye? It's about bloody time.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_011<tab>I admit, ye look as though ye just picked up a sword yesterday. But ye handle yerself well enough, I'll give ye that.
TEXT_SUBWIL013_00571_WOLKAN_012<tab>And here, I'll give ye this, as well. Ain't worth a night in Ul'dah's finest pillowhouse, but I'm sure ye'll find a use for it.
